name: large bed
look_description: The bed is a gargantuan monstrosity that takes up the majority of the room. It is a four-poster bed with massive, carved wooden posts and curtains made of a heavy, red velvet. The curtains are currently tied back with thick, golden ropes.

touch.text: The bed feels soft enough, though a bit unclean.

lay.text: You lay on the bed. It's comfy enough. You get up again.
